resources.string:
• PicQuest uses Pixabay API as its image source.

 • For developers: Please replace the API_KEY in `${Project_Root_Directory}/secrets.defaults.properties` with your Pixabay API key.

 • For non-developers: Ensure that your PicQuest Apk is sourced from github.com/azrael8576/picquest, specifically from the apk in the project's Releases.
